name: Solitude seeker
description:
A long time ago...
I was one of the best knights on our planet. With my friends, we protected our kingdom and fought for our king.
When some of my friends died, I decided I needed some rest, but our people can't understand how it's possible that a knight doesn't want to fight for them. 
So I have to find a lonely place far away from here. And only one person can help me...it's Hackerman. He is the best hacker in the whole world.
We began our adventure and I almost got to the final point, but Universe-security caught our signal and now they are trying to kill me. 
Let's see if they have enough warriors.
I hope I will find my Solitude. 
Bye.
